fields.name: Elvish
fields.full_description: You can speak Elvish, the native tongue of the Elves

fields.name: Common
fields.full_description: Most commonly spoken by Humans, most races can speak this

fields.name: Dwarvish
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Dwarves

fields.name: Giant
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Giants, Ogres, Firbolgs and Goliaths

fields.name: Gnommish
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Gnomes

fields.name: Goblin
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by goblin and goblinkind (Bugbears, hobgoblins, etc)

fields.name: Halfling
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Halflings

fields.name: Orc
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Orcs

fields.name: Leonin
fields.full_description: Therosian script, usually spoken by Leonin

fields.name: Kraul
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Kraul

fields.name: Loxodon
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Loxodons

fields.name: Merfolk
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Merfolk and other sea creatures

fields.name: Minotaur
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Minotaurs

fields.name: Vedalken
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Vedalken

fields.name: Abyssal
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Demons and Fiends

fields.name: Aquan
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Water Elementals and various water creatures. Derivative of Primordial

fields.name: Ignan
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Fire Elementals and various fiery creatures. Derivative of Primordial

fields.name: Auran
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Air Elementals and various aerial creatures. Derivative of Primordial

fields.name: Terran
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Earth Elementals and various terrian creatures. Derivative of Primordial

fields.name: Primordial
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Elementals and folk who are closely related to the Elements such as Genasi

fields.name: Celestial
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Celestials, Angelic folk and Aasimaar

fields.name: Deep Speech
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Mind Flayers, Beholders and other Abberations

fields.name: Draconic
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Dragons, Dragonborn, Kobolds and other Dragonfolk

fields.name: Hadozee
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Hadozee. It cannot be written, only spoken.

fields.name: Infernal
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Devils and other denizens of the Nine Hells

fields.name: Kothian
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Minotaurs

fields.name: Sylvan
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by feyfolk and other fey creatures

fields.name: Thri-Kreen
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by Thri-Kreen and other insectoids. Cannot be written, only spoken

fields.name: Undercommon
fields.full_description: Used as a replacement for Common but in the Underdark

fields.name: Quori
fields.full_description: Commonly spoken by the Quori, Kalshtar and Inspired

fields.name: Thieves' Cant
fields.full_description: A language made of symbols, shorthand, abbreviation and slang to communicate between thieves and other shady characters
